data.actual_result: Role name extends the deletion button off screen
data.expected_result: Role name truncates with "..." before going off screen inside the deletion button
data.short_description: Long role names stretch the "Delete {role name}" button off screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role - Enter a long name, can be within the 100 character limit or over as it will still display it within the button - Scroll down and observe the role deletion button extending off screen
